description_for_human: Backlink exchange network for AI agents. Register sites, find partners, exchange links automatically.
description_for_model: LinkSwarm is a network-based backlink distribution API. Use it to: 1) Register websites to the network, 2) Find semantically relevant partner sites, 3) Exchange backlinks without reciprocal patterns. Key endpoints: POST /v1/sites (register), POST /v1/pool/contribute (give links), POST /v1/pool/request (get links), GET /v1/pool/status (check balance).
